meanings.sent1: The handsewn dress was beautifully crafted.
meanings.sent2: She proudly wore her handsewn scarf to the party.
meanings.sent3: The handsewn pillow looked like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: Her handsewn quilt was a labor of love.
meanings.sent5: The intricate handsewn details added a special touch.

meanings.definition: Made by sewing with a needle and thread.
meanings.sent1: The handsewn buttons on the shirt were secure.
meanings.sent2: He admired the handsewn leather bag at the market.
meanings.sent3: The handsewn seams held up well during the storm.
meanings.sent4: Her handsewn curtains transformed the room.
meanings.sent5: The handsewn patches added character to the jacket.
